  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2599</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The difference between a solar day and a sidereal day</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Unterschied zwischen einem Solartag und einem
Sterntag</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La différence entre un jour solaire et un jour 
sidéral</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A diferença entre um dia solar e um dia 
sidereal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La differenza fra un giorno solare e un giorno 
siderale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η διαφορά μεταξύ μιας ηλιακής ημέρας και μιας 
αστρικής ημέρας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La diferencia entre un día solar y un día 
sideral</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This animation demonstrates what is meant by a solar day and its difference from a sidereal day</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solar day</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Animation zeigt, was durch einen Solartag 
und seinen Unterschied von einem Sterntag bedeutet wird</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette animation démontre ce qui est signifié 
par un jour solaire et sa différence d'un jour sidéral</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este animation demonstra o que é significado por
um dia solar e por sua diferença de um dia sidereal</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa animazione dimostra che cosa è 
significato tramite un giorno solare e la relativa differenza da un 
giorno siderale</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η ζωτικότητα καταδεικνύει τι από μια ηλιακή 
ημέρα και σημαίνει η διαφορά του από μια αστρική ημέρα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta animación demuestra qué es significada por
un día solar y su diferencia a partir de un día sideral</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solartag</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jour solaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dia solar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">giorno solare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλιακή ημέρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">día solar</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
